Activity: Arrive at the hospital, log in to the system, and check emails. Review any feedback from @clinlead-1 Nadia Silva regarding yesterday's patient summary.
Attend a brief team huddle to discuss any updates or changes to influenza protocols or EHR procedures.
Begin patient assessments and EHR documentation, focusing on influenza symptoms. Ensure proper data entry for all patients, cross-referencing information with patient history when needed.
Consult with Physician Champion @pchmp-1 if any complex cases arise that require further clinical guidance.
Lunch break. Check personal emails and browse online shopping sites.
Continue patient assessments and EHR documentation. Focus on verifying the accuracy of lab results entered into the system.
Identify patients who may benefit from influenza vaccination based on their EHR data. Offer vaccination and document accordingly.
Prepare an updated summary of patient encounters, focusing on vaccination rates and any adverse reactions observed. Send summary to Clinical Lead @clinlead-1 Nadia Silva.
Sign out and prepare for tomorrow.
